name: MIRYA
description:
A short prototype set in the world of Mirya.  
Follow the main character as she hacks her way through the undead through the crypt.

Controls
wasd- movement

j- attack

k- Blocking like thing

i- dash (a power that you'll get later in the actual game)

space - Jump

Credits

Main Character - Clembod

Environment - Anokolisa

Muisc - SVL

Main Theme & Dungeon Theme - Tobacco Land Studios

Game Design-  Tobacco Land Studios
